feed.title: Spark NLP
feed.subtitle: High Performance NLP with Apache Spark

entry.title: English pipeline_image_classifier_vit_ALL_2 ViTForImageClassification from Ahmed9275
entry.content:
Description

Pretrained VIT model, adapted from Hugging Face and curated to provide scalability and production-readiness using Spark NLP.image_classifier_vit_ALL_2 is a English model originally trained by Ahmed9275.

Download

How to use


    pipeline = PretrainedPipeline('pipeline_image_classifier_vit_ALL_2', lang = 'en')
    annotations =  pipeline.transform(imageDF)
    


    val pipeline = new PretrainedPipeline("pipeline_image_classifier_vit_ALL_2", lang = "en")
    val annotations = pipeline.transform(imageDF)

Model Information

Model Name: pipeline_image_classifier_vit_ALL_2
Type: pipeline
Compatibility: Spark NLP 4.2.1+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Language: en
Size: 321.9 MB

Included Models

  • ImageAssembler
  • ViTForImageClassification
entry.summary: Description Pretrained VIT model, adapted from Hugging Face and curated to provide scalability and production-readiness using Spark NLP.image_classifier_vit_ALL_2 is a English model originally trained by Ahmed9275. Live Demo Open in Colab Download How to use PythonScalaNLU pipeline = PretrainedPipeline('pipeline_image_classifier_vit_ALL_2', lang = 'en') annotations = pipeline.transform(imageDF) val pipeline = new PretrainedPipeline("pipeline_image_classifier_vit_ALL_2", lang = "en") val annotations = pipeline.transform(imageDF) Model Information Model Name: pipeline_image_classifier_vit_ALL_2 Type: pipeline Compatibility: Spark NLP 4.2.1+ License: Open Source Edition: Official Language: en Size: 321.9 MB Included Models ImageAssembler ViTForImageClassification
